name: packing, clay product | packing, clay product | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4127/documentation

This dataset represents the packing of clay. The packing and loading process is normalized with an annual production volume of 1'000'000 kg/a and a density of 1'600 m3/kg. The estimated lifespan of the machines is assumed to be 25 years.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

Packing processes starting from clay, unpacked.

The dataset includes the process of packing, transportation within the plant and loading of the bags on paletts. The machines used therefore are included in the infrastructure. The waste treatment of the packaging material after use is included. The dataset doesn't include the packed clay!
category: N:Administrative and support service activities/82:Office administrative, office support and other business support activities/829:Business support service activities n.e.c./8292:Packaging activities

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data are from one company (packing, lime products) in Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Assumption that the same process is used as for packing lime products
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data from lime packing are used for the clay packing.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Measured data of one Swiss plant

exchanges.description:
Extrapolation from "packing, lime poducts". 

Estimation. The infraestructure for packing and loading is taken into account, estimating a weight of 30t and a lifespan of 20 years (data copied from "packing, lime products" dataset).

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Extrapolation from "packing, lime poducts". 

Calculation according to the circumference of the pallet (4m), the height (2m), and assuming that 2 layers of plastic with a weight of 0.0123 kg/m2 are needed.  Plastic foil is used for the packing. Data was obtained from http://www.dm-folien.de/hpage.htm (Accessed October 2003).

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Extrapolation from "packing, lime poducts". 

Data from Frantschach per Email (05.06.02). It was assumed an average density of 1600 kg/m3, a loading capacity of 1m3, a weight of 22 kg and a lifetime of 10 uses.

EcoSpold01Location=RER
Extrapolation from "packing, lime poducts". 

Calculation Plastic foil is used for the packing. The amount was calculated according to the circumference of the pallet (4m), the height (2m), and assuming that 2 layers of plastic with a weight of 0.0123 kg/m2 are needed. Data was obtained from http://www.dm-folien.de/hpage.htm (Accessed October 2003).
